short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a minimalistic new tab with current news, todo, note taker, weather, bookmark, custom urls and video. No more boring tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabyetu is a simple but elegant productivity Chrome Extension to keep you informed while staying productive. The color scheme is well designed to brighten your day. You can now replace your boring new tab page with an eye catching and inspirational dashboard

Tabyetu will continuously be improved to solve the tab boredom

Key Features
• High resolution handpicked background video to calm your nerves
• Minimalist background transitions to spark your mood.
• Easy to navigate social media and custom dynamic links
• CNN Headline news, as it happens
• Faster loading
• Todo List and easy to delete
• Note Taker with live auto save
• Weather forecast with both temperature units
 

LOCATION & PERMISSIONS
We try to get weather as per your location. It is difficult to have accurate weather when the location is not precise. We have added a feature to let you decide if you would like to share location for accurate weather. Setting up location increases accuracy. 

TALK TO US

For more information and social engagement, visit our twitter and website
